HEALTH.description: Checks if the hp percentage of the player or entity is in the range

minimumHealthPercentage.description:
The minimum hp percentage. 
Defaults to 0

maximumHealthPercentage.description:
The maximum hp percentage. 
Defaults to 100

CHANCE.description: A chance for this condition to be true

chance.description:
The chance that is used. 
Defaults to 1

COOLDOWN.description: Checks if the time since the get last effect triggered is after the cooldown

cooldown.description:
The cooldown time that is used in seconds. 
Defaults to 10

ENTITY.description: Checks if the entity against this whitelist/blacklist

whitelist.description:
If true, the entities property will whitelist. If false, the entities property will blacklist. 
Defaults to true

entities.description:
The list of entities to be whitelisted/blacklisted. 
Defaults to

SIZE.description: Checks if the size of the entity is in the range (for slimes, magma cubes, and phantoms)

SNEAK.description: Checks if the player or entity is shifting

sneak.description:
If true, checks if the entity is shifting. If false, it checks the opposite. 
Defaults to true

TIME.description: Checks the relative ingame time (time of day) of the world that the player is in against the range. Measured in milli-hours or hours*1000

ONGROUND.description: Checks if the player or entity is on the ground

grounded.description:
If true, checks if the entity is on the ground. If false, it checks the opposite. 
Defaults to true

shouldGlide.description:
If true, checks if the entity is gliding. If false, it checks the opposite. 
Defaults to true

BIOME.description: Checks if the biome that the player, entity, or location is in is one of the listed biomes

biomes.description:
The list of biomes. 
Defaults to

comparison.description:
The comparison to use. 
Defaults to EQUALS

value.description:
The value to compare against. 
Defaults to 0

NPC.description: Checks if the player or entity is an npc

isNPC.description:
If true, checks if the entity is an npc. If false, it checks the opposite. 
Defaults to false

WEATHER.description: Checks if the world that the player is in has a storm

INBLOCK.description: Checks if the player or entity is in one of the listed blocks

blocks.description:
The list of blocks. 
Defaults to

WORLD.description: Checks if the world that the player, entity, or location is in is one of the listed worlds

worlds.description:
The list of worlds. 
Defaults to

TAMED.description: Checks if the entity is tamed

checkOwner.description:
If true, also checks if the player is the owner. 
Defaults to true

FLYING.description: Checks if the player is flying

HEIGHT.description: Checks if the player or entity y location is in the range

height.description:
The range in blocks. 
Defaults to -Infinity - Infinity

BLOCK.description: Checks if the location has one of the listed blocks

materials.description:
The list of blocks. 
Defaults to

ITEM.description: Checks if the declared slot against the declared item

slot.description:
The slot to check. 
Defaults to HAND

types.description:
The list of item types. 
Defaults to

amount.description:
The range of item amount. 
Defaults to -Infinity - Infinity

metadata.description:
The metadata of the item. 
Defaults to [object Object]

displayName.description:
A regex to match the display name against. 
Defaults to .+

lore.description:
A list of regex to match the lore against. 
Defaults to .+

enchants.description:
The item to check against. 
Defaults to [object Object]

value.description:
The level of the enchantment. 
Defaults to -Infinity - Infinity

conditions.description:
The conditions to OR. 
Defaults to [object Object]

\\w.description:
A condition to OR. 
Defaults to [object Object]

VISIBILITY.description: Checks if the player has a direct line of sight to the entity

maxDistance.description:
The maximum distance to the entity. 
Defaults to 16

DAMAGE.description: Damages the player or an entity

damage.description:
The damage that will be dealt. 
Defaults to 5

WRAPPER.description: Excecutes all the inside effects if all the inside conditions are satisfied

conditions.description:
The list of conditions. 
Defaults to [object Object]

effects.description:
The list of effects. 
Defaults to [object Object]

AOE.description: Excecutes all the inside effects if all the inside conditions are satisfied.

radius.description:
Half the side length of the box. 
Defaults to 5

VELOCITY.description: Sets the Y component of the velocity vector of the user or entity. Same as FLING

velocity.description:
The Y velocity to set to. 
Defaults to 1

CANCEL.description: Cancels the event that triggered this effect

GLIDING.description: Sets the gliding mode of the player or entity (works even if an Elytra is not equipped)

glide.description:
If true, makes the player or entity glide. Else if false, makes the player or entity stop gliding. 
Defaults to false

WAIT.description: Waits a duration of time then excecutes all the inside effects if all the inside condition is satisfied

delay.description:
The delay time in seconds (1 is 20 ticks). 
Defaults to 1

POTION.description: Applies the potion effect to the player or entity

potion.description:
The potion effect. 
Defaults to [object Object]

potency.description:
The potency or amplifier of the potion. 
Defaults to 1

duration.description:
The duration of the potion in seconds (1 is 20 ticks). 0 is for infinite duration (Integer maximum ticks). 
Defaults to 10

WEB.description: Change the block at the player or entity for a duration of time, then change it back. Exactly the same effect as the BLOCKENTITY effect

duration.description:
The duration of time that the block will be there in seconds (1 is 20 ticks). If less than 0, the block will not change back. 
Defaults to -1

block.description:
The block to change to. 
Defaults to COBWEB

BLOCKENTITY.description: Change the block at the player or entity for a duration of time, then change it back. Exactly the same effect as the WEB effect

duration.description:
The duration of time that the block will be there in seconds (1 is 20 ticks). If less than 0, the block will not change back. 
Defaults to -1

block.description:
The block to change to. 
Defaults to COBWEB

ARROW.description: Shoot an arrow to the location or the location of the user or target entity

velocity.description:
Used to determine the time that it takes to hit by (pythagoras distance)/velocity. 
Defaults to 1

entity.description:
The entity to shoot. 
Defaults to arrow

damage.description:
If projectile entity is an arrow, the damage that the arrow will do. 
Defaults to 4

MODIFY.description: Modifies a variable, either user defined or not

value.description:
The number on the right side of the operation. 
Defaults to 1

ATTRIBUTE.description: Modifies an attribute owned by the user or entity

attribute.description: The attribute to modify. The name of the attribute should exclude the "GENERIC_" in the begining

LAUNCH.description: Launches an entity at the target

type.description:
The entity to launch. 
Defaults to FIREBALL

velocity.description:
The velocity to launch at. 
Defaults to 1

MESSAGE.description: Sends a chat message to the user or target player

message.description: The message to send. The first occurence of "player" will be replaced by the player name

PICKUP.description: Pick up the target entity and places it on the user's head

velocity.description:
The velocity to repulse the target entity. Positive value means into the user. Negative value means away from the user. 
Defaults to 1

RESIZE.description: Resizes the user or target entity (for slimes, magma cubes, and phantoms)

retainHealth.description:
For slimes and magma cubes. If true, make it retain the previous health (if more than the new max health, it sets it to the max health). 
Defaults to true

SMITE.description: Smites the user or target entity

fake.description:
If true, it only makes the effect of lightning, not summoning an actual lightning. 
Defaults to false

FLING.description: Sets the Y component of the velocity vector of the player or entity. Same as VELOCITY

velocity.description:
The Y velocity to set to. 
Defaults to 1

value.description:
The number on the right side of the operation. 
Defaults to 1

GIVEITEM.description: Gives the user or target entity an item

dropIfFull.description:
If true, drops the items that did not fit into the inventory. 
Defaults to true

type.description:
The type of item. 
Defaults to STONE

amount.description:
The amount of item to give. 
Defaults to 1

metadata.description:
The metadata of the item. 
Defaults to [object Object]

displayName.description: The display name of the item. Defaults to the normal item name

lore.description:
The lore of the item. 
Defaults to

isUnbreakable.description:
If true, makes the item unbreakable. 
Defaults to false

durability.description:
The durability of the item. 0 is normal durability. 
Defaults to 0

value.description:
The attribute properties. 
Defaults to null

The value of the attribute to change to. 
Defaults to 0

equipmentslot.description:
The slot that this attribute will be active. 
Defaults to HAND

color.description:
If type is a leather armour. This contains the color metadata of the item. 
Defaults to [object Object]

potion.description:
If type is a potion, splash potion, lingering potion, or tipped arrow. This contains the potion metadata of the item. 
Defaults to [object Object]

extended.description:
Whether the potion is extended. 
Defaults to false

upgraded.description:
Whether the potion is upgraded. 
Defaults to false

SCRAMBLEINVENTORY.description: Scrambles the user or target entity's inventory

RANDOMTELEPORT.description: Teleports the user or target entity a random distance

PROJECTILE.description: Shoots an entity from the user, if mode is SELF, shoots the entity in the direction that the user is looking

type.description:
The entity type. 
Defaults to ZOMBIE

nametag.description: The nametag of the spawned entity. Defaults to no nametag

shouldDespawn.description:
If true, the entity can despawn. 
Defaults to true

passenger.description:
The passanger of the entity. 
Defaults to [object Object]

SOUND.description: Plays a sound at a location or at the location of the user or target entity

sound.description:
The sound to make. 
Defaults to ENTITY_GENERIC_EXPLODE

volume.description:
The volume of the sound. 
Defaults to 1

pitch.description:
The pitch of the sound. 
Defaults to 1

executor.description:
The executor that will execute the command. 
Defaults to CONSOLE

command.description: The command to execute. "%self_name%" will be interpreted as the user if the user is a player. Otherwise, "%target_name%" will be interpreted as the target entity if the target entity is a player

LUNGE.description: Applies an acceleration to the user or the target entity based on the direction the user is looking

horizontalVelocity.description:
The scale to scale the horizontal components of the velocity vector. 
Defaults to 0

verticalVelocity.description:
The scale to scale the vertical components of the velocity vector. 
Defaults to 0

overwrite.description:
If true, sets the velocity vector. If false, adds to the velocity vector. 
Defaults to true

NEAREST.description: Excecutes all the inside effects to the nearest player and entity in the box centered on the location or the location of the user or target entity if all the inside conditions are satisfied

radius.description:
Half the side length of the box. 
Defaults to 5

SHOOTER.description: Excecutes all the inside effects if all the inside conditions are satisfied. With the shooter of the original target entity as the new target entity

onlyProjectiles.description:
If true, only excecutes the inside effects if the original target entity is a projectile. If false, forwards the original target entity to the inside conditions and effects. 
Defaults to true

KNOCKBACK.description: Applies a velocity to the target entity with the direction that the user is looking as the direction

multiplier.description:
The velocity to apply. 
Defaults to 1

overwriteCurrentVelocity.description:
If true, sets the target's velocity. If false, adds to the target's original velocity. 
Defaults to true

IGNITE.description: Sets the user or target entity on fire

fireTicks.description:
The amount of time the fire will last (in ticks). 
Defaults to 0

TARGET.description: If the user is a mob, sets the target of the user to the target entity

SWAP.description: Swaps the position of the user and target entity

PLACEBLOCK.description: Replaces a block at the location for an amount of time. Retains the original block data

material.description:
The block to replace to. 
Defaults to STONE

updatePhysics.description:
If false, does not update neighboring blocks. 
Defaults to true

revertsAfter.description:
Time before the block reverts to the original block in seconds (1 is 20 ticks). If less than or equal to 0, does not revert the original block. 
Defaults to -1

REMOVEPOTION.description: Removes potion effects from the user or target entity

types.description:
The list of potion types. If empty, removes all potion effect. 
Defaults to

TELEPORT.description: Teleports the user to the location or the location of the target entity

REMOVEENTITY.description: Removes the user or target entity
